name: Balancer rETH Stable Pool
description: This token represents a Balancer Stable liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pools, and can also deposit the LP to Balancer's gauges to earn BAL emissions. This pool contains wETH and rETH. Rocketpool Ether is Rocket Pool's liquid staking derivative for staked Ether.
